channel.title: Server not approving?
channel.description: hey guys... well i was wondeing why my sever isnt approving ? i added tons of information, an its been quite some time, and it still isnt active when i click edit server, it says i didnt psot a sever, but when i go to post it it says this sserver has already been aded, and yes i have added it because when i created the acc and click register server it woked and i approved it, but i guess mopar has to appove it or something? help me please![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2009, 04:01:10 pm[/size][hr]sory, to bump this post.. but it seems like mopar staff doesnt really care about there economy, usually i'd get feedback by now :(

item.title: Server not approving?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Hero317:

sory, to bump this post… but it seems like mopar staff doesnt really care about there economy, usually i’d get feedback by now

Didn’t bump it. Only another person can bump your topic, if you’re the last person to have posted.
Economy is the wrong term. You mean community. Economy = community of stock and trade.

Read full topic

item.title: Server not approving?
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

ok ik if i can help but make sure your server is log-onable, like make sure if you are using no-ip that it works and others can log onto it, also make sure your server supports the auto account creation by typing in any random username and any random password for an account to be created, if it doesnt support it, then mopar gives u a username and a pass for the account it willbe using to check your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Server not approving?

item.description:
@Hero317 wrote:

hey guys… well i was wondeing why my sever isnt approving ? i added tons of information, an its been quite some time, and it still isnt active when i click edit server, it says i didnt psot a sever, but when i go to post it it says this sserver has already been aded, and yes i have added it because when i created the acc and click register server it woked and i approved it, but i guess mopar has to appove it or something? help me please![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 10, 2009, 04:01:10 pm[/size][hr]sory, to bump this post… but it seems like mopar staff doesnt really care about there economy, usually i’d get feedback by now
